name: Evil★Twin's Chaos Collab
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by banishing 1 LIGHT "Evil★Twin" Link Monster and 1 DARK "Evil★Twin" Link Monster from your GY. If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate this effect. You can banish 4 "Live☆Twin" monsters with different names from your GY, and if you do, this card gains 2200 ATK/DEF and is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can banish an "Evil★Twin" Link Monster from your GY, and if you do, target 1 card your opponent controls: banish it. You can only activate each effect of "Evil★Twin's Chaos Collab" once per turn.
